991490.name: The Black Knight
991490.description:
Black knight is an arcade line defence game. Hundreds of monsters are trying to escape from an ancient crypt and only you can stop them. The main character - Warden - can move between the three lines and cast spells on each line to destroy enemies. You need to defeat 10 waves of different evil beings and prevent them from reaching the tomb entrance. The game can be completed within 10 minutes, but it’s hard enough to make you suffer for a couple of hours. It’s unbalanced and has several non-critical bugs, so try it on your own risk!

Music&Sounds - Xenakex Studio
991490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
